item.title: Floating Symbols
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: const r = new rive.Rive({ // src: "https://cdn.rive.app/animations/vehicles.riv", // Or the path to a public Rive asset src: 'https://www.long-thoughts.com/creatives/meditating_buddha.riv', // src: '/creatives/meditating_buddha.riv', canvas: document.getElementById("canvas"), autoplay: true, stateMachines: "All Together", onLoad: () = { r.resizeDrawingSurfaceToCanvas(); }, }); Animated Artwork collection: “Symbols”
